participant_1.name: Ella
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Ella finds joy in the details of life and often loses herself in the world of words and art.
participant_1.background: I have a strange obsession with pens. I like to think about what it would be like to be an artist. I wish I made more money. I enjoy writing for long periods of time.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and free-spirited, Jake loves to share his experiences and connect with others through his music.
participant_2.background: I used to travel the USA playing guitar. My favorite band is The Story So Far. I recently started to work online. I used to work at a factory making boxes. I eat meat.

content.text: I'm a bit of a pen nerd. I love collecting different types of pens and I love writing with them.
I used to travel the US playing guitar. I've always wanted to write a song about my experiences.
That would be really cool! What kind of music do you play?
I play a lot of different types of music, but my favorite is probably acoustic folk.
I love acoustic folk music! That's what I usually write too.
Oh cool! We should collaborate on a song sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love to.
Great! I'll send you a message later and we can work out the details.
Sounds good!
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a writer. I love to write for long periods of time.
That's cool! I used to work at a factory making boxes, but I recently started working online.
What kind of work do you do online?
I'm a content writer for a website.
Oh, that sounds interesting! Do you like it?
Yeah, it's pretty fun. I get to write about a variety of topics.
That's great! I'm glad you're enjoying it.
Thanks! I am.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play guitar, write music, and hang out with friends.
I like to write for long periods of time, draw, and watch TV.
Oh, I love to draw too! I used to draw a lot when I was younger.
I still draw a lot. I love it!
Me too! It's a great way to express yourself.
I agree!
